label: Random Villages 1
description:
Zanzibar does some more shows in some other villages.
Max attends one of his shows, but Corvus manages to steal from Max without his notice.
As Max is flying home, he noticed his coin purse had been cut.

Hit 1 if you want Max to land and search for Zanzibar on foot.
Hit 2 if you want Max to try to search from the air.

Hit 0 to quit.
